entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 24. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
